name: lihbr-apex
description: Source code of lihbr.com, my personal blog, you should check it out~
author: Lucie Haberer <hello@lihbr.com> (https://lihbr.com)

scripts.build: echo "Error: no build command specified" && exit 1
scripts.dev: echo "Error: no dev command specified" && exit 1
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run test && standard-version && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:alpha: npm run build && npm run test && standard-version --release-as major --prerelease alpha && git push --follow-tags
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
